project.title: Overview of Comfort
project.description:
After taking this course, you will be able to explain the following:
Defining Comfort
Comfort and 5QI & 9QI - HVAC Quality Installation & Verification
Duct Design Basics - Comfort and Manual D
Load Calculation Basics - Comfort and Manual J
Equipment Selection and Sizing - Comfort and Manual S
Air Distribution Basics - Comfort and Manual T
